trans-unit.source: Exposes the header of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"></xref> types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] when a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"></xref> is collapsed.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this automation peer contains data that is presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示与此自动化对等方关联的元素是否包含向用户显示的数据。
